name: GAN-HOO BBQ
address: 37-02 Main St 2nd FLOOR, Flushing, NY 11354, USA

reviews.text:
The best tofu everrrrr!!!
The beef platter, marinated ribs, and wagyu fried rice are amazing! I love them. The fried calamari wasnâ€™t as good as I expected, but overall great BBQ!

This was my second visit because the food here is honestly amazing juicy, flavorful BBQ that I couldnâ€™t stop thinking about after my first time. I even planned to come again soon for my birthday party because I loved it so much.

But this visit was a total disappointment because of the waitress named Yuxin who served me. From the moment I sat down, her attitude was cold and unfriendly. That annoyed expression the entire time. Every time I asked for something, she seemed irritated, like she didnâ€™t want to deal with me at all.

What made it worse was how completely different she acted toward the Chinese customers nearby.

And when she brought the check, she even gave it to me with attitude, like she couldnâ€™t wait for me to leave. It was the final touch on an already uncomfortable experience.
I came here to enjoy good food not to feel ignored and uncomfortable. The kitchen deserves five stars but the service gets zero. I left feeling disappointed and honestly disrespected.
Rich variety and great service

Best cheese corn I've ever had. Great fancy BBQ restaurant, perfect for a nice dinner. Food is good quality, everything is great including the seasonings and free appetizers. Clean and nice atmosphere, attention to detail, thoughtful service. Worth the price.

I have been here a bunch of times and every time has been amazing. Never a bad time, lovely staff who are so attentive and such a fun eating experience with lots of perks like AYCE and a birthday platter.
Lovely atmosphere, food and service for the price. Our server Ray was amazing and accommodating.
Gan Hoo BBQ is really delicious. Their AYCE Buffet is worth the price and the meat is fresh! Recommend to come again!
I am already a loyal customer of this restaurant. The beef quality is good and the taste is also very good.

The best KBBQ in New York! Staff are helpful, awesome atmosphere, great fresh meat, yummy side dishes and complimentary drinks. Worth the drive from upstate to NYC. Price is reasonable!
The vibe of the restaurant is top tier. Food was amazing and service was fantastic. Tessica was super nice and helpful!
This is our go to spot for bbq when we are in flushing. The quality and service is top notch. Highly recommend

All the food was fire gang. Christ is king.
Loved the atomosphere here. The food was amazing and fresh even down to the lettuce. Will be back for sure!
Very tasty food, really good prices and quality ingredients. Fast service, always a good option to visit when in flushing NY.
å¥½åƒï¼

Hidden gem outside the main ktown neighborhood!! After a few hours at the gym, an all you can eat meal is a must!!! Everything was delicious. Ordered beef, pork, chicken and seafood with various soups and banchan sides. Highly recommended for their service and food quality!
é£Ÿæå¾ˆæ–°é²œ å¥½åƒ
Nice bbq and service
We come back here almost every week. Great food, best service. Highly recommended

Had a very nice experience here. New KBBQ restaurant that had a sleek interior finishes and an exciting atmosphere. The staff was very friendly and helpful, and the meat was excellent. Highly recommend to anyone who loves Korean BBQ

Everyone should experience GAN-HOO BBQ at least once! My first visit here immediately convinced me to come back for more. The food is incredibly fresh and perfectly complemented by a variety of unique spices and sauces. The staff is amazingâ€”friendly, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. Trust me, thereâ€™s no way youâ€™ll leave this place hungry!
One of my favorite kbbq spots in flushing. Nice setting and fresh meats

Such an amazing lunch! I got the meat platter and it was perfect for me! They also have a ALL YOU CAN EAT with so many different kinds of meat, 11/10 recommended.  My waitress was named KHAI and she helped me with everything and was so kind! A must stop for your nyc experience!
The meat is very tender and juicy. Strongly recommend this restaurant.
Everything about this place is perfect. Very attentive servers and all the meat was amazing quality. Sides were delicious and refillable. Would definitely recommend.

One of the best Wagyu fried Rice Iâ€™ve had in my life. Ray, Khai, and Raef were amazing servers and provided amazing 5 star hospitality. The beef was so tender and they cook it for you, amazing, love it 10/10 deffo recommend!!
Great as always!

Love their beef combo and Wagyu fried rice. The cheese corn portion gets smaller and smaller each time I go. It used to be the size a small of a tin oil container but now they gave you a size of the size of a soup cup.

The service speed, environment, and food are all amazing. My order was delivered within 5 minutes and we had a free kids meal of generous proportions. I come every week!

Paradise for grill lovers! The meats are high quality with beautiful marbling just a light sear and theyâ€™re tender, juicy, and super flavorful. Shrimp and other seafood are fresh and bouncy. There are plenty of sauces and sides, the grill heat is steady, and the staff swap grates quickly. The classic Chinese-style interior is comfy and great for groups.

Value is excellent: portions are generous and plates are big, so you donâ€™t need to order a lot to leave full. Must-tries are the marbled beef slices and fattier cutsâ€”best lightly grilled, then wrapped with crisp lettuce to balance the richness. Overall, tasty, great value, and Iâ€™ll definitely be back!

I want to say everyone should experience GAN-HOO BBQ at least once. My 1st visit here only demanded I return to enjoy the experience again. The food is super fresh & complimented by an array of optional unique spices and sauces.  The staff is amazing and there is no way you will leave out of this place still hungry.

Ordered the Meat Loverâ€™s Stairs Combo for $89.99. I love how they presented and served the food. The meat tastes good. Serving is good for 2 to 3 persons. I love the vibes of the place. Photos, food and place is instagrammable. ğŸ˜‹â¤ï¸ğŸ½ï¸

Best Korean barbecue I have every had. They provided high quality, tender meat and a nice plus was the beef tallow to took with. The service was great and very attentive. The atmosphere to me was not anything super special but nice. Had to wait to get seated and itâ€™s 100% worth it!

A great Chinese/Korean BBQ spot with high-quality ingredients. The generously portioned meat was incredibly tender and a definite highlight. The spicy cucumbers were a refreshing counterpoint to the fatty beef, and the seafood pancake was perfectly crispy. The only minor critique was that the seafood pancake dipping sauce was a bit too salty, so we ended up using the complimentary dipping sauces instead. Overall, a highly recommended and satisfying meal.

This is my first time visiting Gan Hoo because my friend has been recommending this place several time. I went there for the first time and the atmosphere is really good and the staff are friendly. The most important thing is their food quality. I highly recommend Bullish Wagyu which literally melts in my mouth. I would definitely come back again.

Superb.  This is probably one of the top 3 Koren BBQs in all of NYC.
Meat is great quality and very thinly sliced.  Great presentations.  Very fast and efficient service.
We come here again and again.
Our kids love this place too.
Highly recommend it!

I recently had the pleasure of experiencing an outstanding BBQ, and I'm excited to share my thoughts! The food was exceptionally delicious, with every bite bursting with flavor. The service was top-notch, the staff were attentive and friendly, making the whole experience even more enjoyable.ğŸ˜‹ Moreover, the presentation of the dishes was impeccable, showing the chef's attention to detail. I highly recommend this BBQ to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience! ğŸ–ğŸ”¥

Amazing steak and very affordable dry aged steak. All the dry aged steak had sage and thyme underneath them for those subtle notes. Service and ambiance is top notch and the presentation of the steak is creative. Bathrooms are immaculately clean.

Lots of different rubs and sauce for the meat. Limited seafood options for lunch though

It delivers an unforgettable dining experience that goes far beyond just great food. The quality of the meat is outstanding â€” every cut is fresh, well-marbled, and grilled to juicy perfection. Whether itâ€™s the tender beef short ribs, flavorful lamb skewers, or crispy chicken wings, each bite bursts with authentic smoky flavor and expertly balanced seasoning. You can tell the chefs take great care in preparing every dish. Even the side dishes â€” like the grilled vegetables and savory dipping sauces â€” are top-notch and add depth to the overall meal.

What makes truly special is the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The staff are incredibly attentive and friendly, making sure your grill is always just right and your table never lacks for anything. The restaurant is clean, stylish, and has a lively yet relaxed vibe â€” perfect for both casual nights out and special gatherings. And with such high-quality food and service, the prices are more than fair. If youâ€™re looking for a place that gets every detail right, from the grill to the hospitality, this restaurant is a must-try.

I really like coming here especially during their AYCE hours since the price is fair and the food is really good. I also really like the staff who are always attentive and ready to help. Would recommend!

Writing this as the third time weâ€™ve been here: Beef quality is excellent. The wagyu fried rice is really good; and the bathrooms are clean and soap smells good. We were able to reserve a table 2 hours before on a saturday evening. Great service
Clean atmosphere and good quality food. The waiter is really kind and attentive. We are doing the ayce meal with a good amount of selection. The smells of the meat were really good.
Me and my family came for my brothers birthday and had so much fun! He got the birthday meat cake, and we ordered the meat stair combo. The food came out super quick and cooking together was great!

I had an amazing meal at this BBQ restaurant. The ribs were tender and full of flavor, and the brisket just melted in my mouth. The sides were delicious tooâ€”especially the mac and cheese. The staff was super friendly and made us feel right at home. Iâ€™ll definitely be coming back

Steak was excellent and delicious! So were the vegetables.  It is some work to cook the food yourself, but at least it is cooked to perfection!  Just the way that you like it.  Also, kind of fun and has a barbecue feeling to it.

The BBQ was absolutely delicious! The meat was tender, juicy, and perfectly seasoned. The flavors were rich and mouthwatering, making every bite a delight. The sides complemented the meal wonderfully, adding variety and freshness. A fantastic dining experience that Iâ€™d highly recommend to any BBQ lover!
Had a really good experience here. The BBQ was flavorful and cooked just right, we especially enjoyed the ribs and grilled mushrooms. Everything tasted fresh, and the portion sizes were fair.

The presentation of the meat was absolutely stunning â€” especially the way it was displayed on a wooden bridge. Each cut of beef was fresh, beautifully marbled, and incredibly tender when grilled. I especially enjoyed the variety of meats, from short ribs to pork belly, and the dipping sauces complemented them perfectly.

The vegetables were fresh and crisp, and I loved wrapping the grilled meat in lettuce with garlic and ssamjang â€” classic and delicious. The small pot of braised beef stew added a warm, comforting touch to the meal, and the enoki mushrooms and shrimp were a nice bonus.

Service was attentive, and the atmosphere was cozy yet vibrant. Perfect for a casual night out or a gathering with friends. Highly recommend if youâ€™re a BBQ lover!

The BBQ here is absolutely delicious! The meat is fresh, juicy, and perfectly seasoned â€” every bite is full of flavor. The staff is friendly and attentive, always ready to help with the grill and change the nets. The restaurant is clean and comfortable, making it a great spot for gatherings with friends or family. I had a wonderful dining experience and will definitely come back again!
The apps were very good, meats were really fast and everything came out so quickly. Definitely will be coming back. Their AYCE deal was well worth it

I celebrated my daughterâ€™s 15th birthday here with her friends and the service was excellent food was delicious and we had a private space for our big party which l love the most. The staff are friendly and services were great. The quality of meat  was fresh.

I would give it two extra stars if I could. This is like Korean bbq but Chinese style and SO MUCH BETTER. The food quality is insanely high, pricing is very cheap for what it is. $40 for Ayce! Service is great and the atmosphere is nice too. I am honestly shocked lol. Iâ€™m a big fan of Korean bbq but Iâ€™ve never had it with a Chinese twist. Wow! If LA had this Iâ€™d never visit any other kbbq again. ğŸ¥²Donâ€™t hesitate, come here!

Spacious Chinese/Korean grill-at-the-table barbecue restaurant off of Main Street in Flushing. AYCE is a great deal at $39.99 for 2 hours. Varied selection of quality meats - beef, pork and chicken. Light on the veggie options however. Our server was especially helpful in navigating us through the menu with food allergens. A solid option amongst the hotpot and noodle spots in the area.

This ganhoo BBQ spot was absolutely fantastic! The meat was incredibly fresh, sliced just rightâ€”not too thin, not too thickâ€”and grilled to perfection with an amazing aroma. The pork belly and beef tongue were especially delicious, crispy on the outside and juicy inside. Every bite was full of flavor and really satisfying.

The menu offers a great varietyâ€”not just the usual pork, beef, and lamb, but also tasty side dishes and hot items that complement the BBQ perfectly. You can tell each dish is carefully prepared and generously portioned.

The service was excellent as well. Staff were attentive, helped change the grill plate regularly, and even offered to assist with grilling. The dining area was clean, well-ventilated, and comfortableâ€”no overwhelming smoke or greasy smell.

Itâ€™s a perfect place for group dinners or family meals. After one visit, youâ€™ll definitely want to come back. Highly recommended for anyone who enjoys authentic Chinese BBQ!
Friendly and helpful service. Love that they have a birthday meat cake. Great there are choices of buffet or al la carte. Bathroom really nice, with mouthwash.

The food, especially the wagyu, was rich and flavorful in a way that I have never tasted at other restaurants. I definitely recommend their meat platters and the food is well worth its cost. The waiters were very friendly and patient with us as well. Definitely recommend!

A place I always came when carve for BBQ. Great food - the meat is always so fresh, appetizers taste amazing. Itâ€™s also reasonably priced. Great place to hang out with friends or give yourself a treat.

The ambience in the place was great! There was plenty of seating, we didnâ€™t have to wait long on a Friday night at all. They have a nice selection of meat and other meals, as well as condiments/sauces to go with. Would recommend!

Great service - constant grill changing.  Meats were good, but donâ€™t sleep on dishes like the seafood pancake, Wagyu fried rice, and cheese corn (all very tasty).  The birthday meat cake promotion, free pitcher of plum juice for review promotion, and free ice cream at the end make this place a really good deal.

Love the food here. The all you can eat buffet is a amazing deal, it has a cool atmosphere and there are so many options in the menu including beef brisket,flat iron,as well as corn and cheese. the service here is amazing as well
